{/* @sniptest testers/browser-controls/email_read.py */}

```python email_read.py
from notte_sdk import NotteClient

client = NotteClient()


def extract_link(messages):
    # Extract verification link from messages
    return "https://example.com/verify?token=abc123"


# Create persona with email
persona = client.Persona()
emails = persona.emails()

# Use in session
with client.Session() as session:
    # Trigger email (e.g., verification email)
    session.execute(type="fill", selector="input[name='email']", value=emails[0])
    session.execute(type="click", selector="button.send-verification")

    # Read email
    messages = session.execute(type="email_read", persona_id=persona.persona_id)

    # Extract verification link
    link = extract_link(messages)
```
